author: unknown
quote: Be yourself, but be your best self.

author: unknown
quote: Necessity is the mother of invention.

author: unknown
quote: Trust takes years to build, only seconds to break but forever to repair.

author: unknown
quote: Don't waste your energy on unnecessary battles.

author: unknown
quote: You are the product of what you do everyday.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.

author: Robin Sharma
quote: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.

author: unknown
quote: No lesson in life comes without a cost. So when I say life taught me, you better believe I paid the price.

author: unknown
quote: Self-love is about knowing how to transfer your flaws into your strengths.
